title: Scheduling Notes
body_html:
Scheduling Implementation Notes

Event Types

  • ResearchEvent: Topic, due_date, keywords
  • SystemCheckEvent: System_name, check_type, severity
  • NetworkStatusEvent: Network_name, check_type, threshold
  • SocialMediaReviewEvent: Platform, account, review_date, suggested_modifications
  • WebsiteReviewEvent: Website_url, metrics_to_track, suggested_optimizations, review_date
